com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes
Class Shape

java.lang.Object
  com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes.Shape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Line, Polygon, Rectangle, Text
public abstract class Shape
extends Object
implements Serializable

Lays a few basic properties/methods that all shapes must have. All drawing shapes subclass this class.

Since:
25/04/2004
Version:
1
Author:
David Terei
See Also:

Field Detail

serialVersionUID

private static final long serialVersionUID
The signiture number for this class for use with serilization. This number is normally generated on the fly by analyzing the class and its fields. By manually specifing it, i am able to change so parts of this class, while still allowing older saved maps to remain compatible, as these id's must match with the saved one and this class.

resize

public abstract void resize(double percent)
Resize the shape, according to the double value percent, specified. This method allows shapes to be 'zoomed' in on.

Parameters:
percent - The size, in decimals, for the shape to be, relative to its 'base' size. So a value of 2 will double the shape compared to its original value.

paint

public void paint(Graphics2D g)
The painting method for each shape.

Parameters:
g - The graphics object to draw to.
